plot: Football is a tradition in Arkansas, and they play to win. With newly hired head coach Bret Bielema, a pro-level team of assistant coaches and a team of players with something to prove, Arkansas is poised to surprise the S.E.C. in 2013.
title: Arkansas Razorbacks Football
plot_es: Football is a tradition in Arkansas, and they play to win. With newly hired head coach Bret Bielema, a pro-level team of assistant coaches and a team of players with something to prove, Arkansas is poised to surprise the S.E.C. in 2013.
plot_en: Football is a tradition in Arkansas, and they play to win. With newly hired head coach Bret Bielema, a pro-level team of assistant coaches and a team of players with something to prove, Arkansas is poised to surprise the S.E.C. in 2013.
